channel.title: How do you make an npc face a given direction?
channel.description: Hello everyone, now i have been researching for weeks now on how to make an NPC face a direction other than south, i have read pages after pages of questions on this and still there is no answer. I have tested about 50 different server sources and they all have there NPC's facing south! Obviously it is possible to make an NPC face a given direction, but how? I think it is time that someone with a lot of experience comes on this page and solves this problem for good, thanks for reading and i hope to get some good feedback.

item.title: How do you make an npc face a given direction?
item.dc:creator: @Zederation Zederation
item.description:
@Zederation wrote:

OK thanks guys, any more feedback anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 09:46:06 am[/size][hr]CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME AND THE COMMUNITY BY POSTING A HELPFULL COMMENT ON HOW TO DO THIS?!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make an npc face a given direction?

@Zederation wrote:

Hello everyone, now i have been researching for weeks now on how to make an NPC face a direction other than south, i have read pages after pages of questions on this and still there is no answer. I have tested about 50 different server sources and they all have there NPC’s facing south! Obviously it is possible to make an NPC face a given direction, but how? I think it is time that someone with a lot of experience comes on this page and solves this problem for good, thanks for reading and i hope to get some good feedback.
